'''Little Fei''' is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. He can be found playing with [[Little Lulu]] and [[Little Meng]] on the deck of one of the ships anchored at the harbor.

===Appearance===
Little Fei is a child with black hair and black eyes, he wears a brown sleeveless jacket over his light gray shirt, dark gray shorts, black and brown boots, and a brown hat.
